Discover Luxury Apartments in Burbank, CA
You deserve luxury apartments in Burbank, CA that cultivate an authentic and hospitable community atmosphere.

Riverside is a smoke-free, Wi-Fi enabled, green-friendly community with an extensive list of amenities ranging from a resort-inspired swimming pool with a whirlpool spa, to a lounge seating area on an observation deck with beautiful views.
We give our residents plenty of common spaces to entertain guests and socialize.

Chat in the picnic area with barbecue grilling stations, relax in our resident clubhouse that comes complete with a plasma TV and full kitchen facilities, or catch a movie on our theater’s 90" projection screen.
With all these features, we see no reason to delay—call now!
We’ve teamed up with Clutter to make Moving & Storage more convenient for residents!
